name: Name
sign_up_prompt: Don't have an account? Sign Up
already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign In
welcome_message: Welcome to the attendance registration application
welcome_message2: Easily clock in and out using geolocation
internet_disconnect: Internet connection is required to view the site
distribution_choice_text: If you want the college to distribute you to the list of factories it has, choose "By College". If you want to search for another factory and agree with it yourself, choose "Other"
College_distribution_choice_text_not_yet: The distribution of factories from the college has not been announced yet
College_distribution_choice_text_done: This is the announced distribution. Open it and search for your name to find out where your training is located
Not_College_distribution_text: This list of factories is to give you some suggestions about factories only, but we do not have contracts with them and you must contact them yourself.
add_new_factory_request: Submit a request to add a new factory
no_factory_data_in_this_gov: We do not have data on factories in this governorate.
